name: Claude
description: Anthropic's Claude models - excels with structured XML tags and clear boundaries

bestPractices.tip: Use XML tags to structure your prompt (e.g., <context>, <task>, <constraints>)

examples.good:
<context>I'm building a web app</context>
<task>Review this code for security issues</task>
examples.bad: Review this code for security issues, by the way I'm building a web app

bestPractices.tip: Claude responds well to explicit role assignments with 'You are...'

examples.good: You are a senior security engineer reviewing code for vulnerabilities.

bestPractices.tip: Be explicit about what you want Claude to avoid or include

examples.good: Do not include placeholder comments. Provide complete, working code.
